类 Item

java.lang.Object
  Item

public class Item
extends java.lang.Object

This class is for item. In this class users can create a item or change the values of item's attributes. In the program, discount is count automatically by rules.

版本：
(16/10/2015)
作者：
(Luyang Ye)
